name: Dice of Oz [GMTK 2022]
description:
A tiny puzzle game where you put cubes on buttons... Wait, why there are dots on the sides of the cubes and why the environment react to the number they display?

Subscribe to my YouTube channel for the upcoming devlog: https://www.youtube.com/LizardOfOz

Known issue: your character gets stuck if you push a dice against the wall. Solution: the button "V" respawns your character.
